content: Curios in Black Myth: Wukong act as accessories, equipment you can equip to boost your stats or unlock new buffs. Most of these can be found in boxes throughout the game's chapters. However, some are dropped by bosses or unlocked in other, more unique ways.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Curios.md', within the main section titled 'Curios'.
The content is as follows:
Curios in Black Myth: Wukong act as accessories, equipment you can equip to boost your stats or unlock new buffs. Most of these can be found in boxes throughout the game's chapters. However, some are dropped by bosses or unlocked in other, more unique ways.
